mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.openid AS "openid", a.out_refund_no AS "out_refund_no", a.out_trade_no AS "out_trade_no", a.refund_desc AS "refund_desc", a.refund_id AS "refund_id", a.appid AS "appid", a.mch_id AS "mch_id", a.nonce_str AS "nonce_str", a.sign AS "sign", a.sign_type AS "sign_type", a.total_fee AS "total_fee", a.settlement_total_fee AS "settlement_total_fee", a.fee_type AS "fee_type", a.cash_fee AS "cash_fee", a.cash_fee_type AS "cash_fee_type", a.transaction_id AS "transaction_id", a.time_end AS "time_end", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.err_code AS "err_code", a.refund_status AS "refundStatus", a.coupon_refund_count AS "coupon_refund_count", a.coupon_refund_fee AS "coupon_refund_fee", a.cash_refund_fee AS "cash_refund_fee", a.refund_fee_type AS "refund_fee_type", a.settlement_refund_fee AS "settlement_refund_fee", a.refund_fee AS "refund_fee", a.err_code_des AS "err_code_des", a.success_time AS "success_time", a.refund_recv_accout AS "refund_recv_accout", a.refund_account AS "refund_account", a.refund_request_source AS "refund_request_source"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sec_pay_refund a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM sec_pay_refund a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_pay_refund( id, openid, out_refund_no, out_trade_no, refund_desc, refund_id, appid, mch_id, nonce_str, sign, sign_type, total_fee, settlement_total_fee, fee_type, cash_fee, cash_fee_type, transaction_id, create_date, update_date, remarks, err_code, refund_status, coupon_refund_count, coupon_refund_fee, cash_refund_fee, refund_fee_type, settlement_refund_fee, refund_fee, err_code_des, success_time, refund_recv_accout, refund_account, refund_request_source ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openid}, #{out_refund_no}, #{out_trade_no}, #{refund_desc}, #{refund_id}, #{appid}, #{mch_id}, #{nonce_str}, #{sign}, #{sign_type}, #{total_fee}, #{settlement_total_fee}, #{fee_type}, #{cash_fee}, #{cash_fee_type}, #{transaction_id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{err_code}, #{refundStatus}, #{coupon_refund_count}, #{coupon_refund_fee}, #{cash_refund_fee}, #{refund_fee_type}, #{settlement_refund_fee}, #{refund_fee}, #{err_code_des}, #{success_time}, #{refund_recv_accout}, #{refund_account}, #{refund_request_source} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sec_pay_refund SET openid = #{openid}, out_refund_no = #{out_refund_no}, out_trade_no = #{out_trade_no}, refund_desc = #{refund_desc}, refund_id = #{refund_id}, appid = #{appid}, mch_id = #{mch_id}, nonce_str = #{nonce_str}, sign = #{sign}, sign_type = #{sign_type}, total_fee = #{total_fee}, settlement_total_fee = #{settlement_total_fee}, fee_type = #{fee_type}, cash_fee = #{cash_fee}, cash_fee_type = #{cash_fee_type}, transaction_id = #{transaction_id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, err_code = #{err_code}, refund_status = #{refundStatus}, coupon_refund_count = #{coupon_refund_count}, coupon_refund_fee = #{coupon_refund_fee}, cash_refund_fee = #{cash_refund_fee}, refund_fee_type = #{refund_fee_type}, settlement_refund_fee = #{settlement_refund_fee}, refund_fee = #{refund_fee}, err_code_des = #{err_code_des}, success_time = #{success_time}, refund_recv_accout = #{refund_recv_accout}, refund_account = #{refund_account}, refund_request_source = #{refund_request_source} WHERE id = #{id}
